title: Out with Golden Datasets: Here's Why Random Sampling is Better
title1: Out with Golden Datasets: Here's Why Random Sampling is Better
title2: Out with Golden Datasets: Here's Why Random Sampling is Better
description: Crafting high-quality prompts and evaluating them requires both high-quality input variables and clearly defined tasks. In a recent webinar, Nishant Shukla, the senior director of AI at QA Wolf, and Justin Torre, the CEO of Helicone, shared their insights on how they tackled this challenge.
author: Lina Lam
